sqlMap.insert: /* LayoutRecoDAO.insert */ INSERT INTO WP2_LAYOUT_RECO ( LAYOUT_ID ,RECO_TYPE ,RECO_ID ,ORDINAL ,ITEM_ID ,ITEM_ORDINAL ) VALUES ( #LAYOUT_ID# ,#RECO_TYPE# ,#RECO_ID# ,#ORDINAL# ,#ITEM_ID# ,#ITEM_ORDINAL# )
sqlMap.select: /* LayoutRecoDAO.selectListForLayoutTree */ SELECT A.LAYOUT_ID ,A.RECO_TYPE ,A.RECO_ID ,A.ORDINAL ,ISNULL(NULLIF(A.ITEM_ID, ''), '(없음)') AS ITEM_ID ,A.ITEM_ORDINAL ,CASE RECO_TYPE WHEN '10' THEN '통계기반(인기순)' WHEN '20' THEN 'AI기반(아이템기반)' WHEN '30' THEN '편성기반' ELSE '?' END AS RECO_TYPE_NM ,CASE RECO_TYPE WHEN '10' THEN ISNULL((SELECT STATS_NM FROM WP2_STATS_MSTR WHERE STATS_ID = A.RECO_ID), '?') WHEN '20' THEN ISNULL((SELECT AI_NM FROM WP2_AI_MSTR WHERE AI_ID = A.RECO_ID), '?') WHEN '30' THEN ISNULL((SELECT MANUAL_NM FROM WP2_MANUAL_MSTR WHERE MANUAL_ID = A.RECO_ID), '?') ELSE '?' END AS RECO_NM ,ISNULL(NULLIF(B.ITEM_NM, ''), '(없음)') AS ITEM_NM FROM WP2_LAYOUT_RECO A LEFT OUTER JOIN WP2_ITEM_MSTR B ON B.ITEM_ID = A.ITEM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.LAYOUT_ID = #LAYOUT_ID# ORDER BY A.ORDINAL
sqlMap.delete: /* LayoutRecoDAO.deleteByLayoutlId */ DELETE FROM WP2_LAYOUT_RECO WHERE 1=1 AND LAYOUT_ID = #LAYOUT_ID#
